metadata.title: CVE-2022-1201 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: NULL Pointer Dereference in mrb_vm_exec with super in GitHub repositorymruby/mruby prior to 3.2. This vulnerability is capable of making the mrubyinterpreter crash, thus affecting the availability of the system.

criterions.comment: mruby: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
